The Head of the Computer Science & Data Science (CSD) Department is Mr. Syed Mushtaq Ali.
Let me check. Please provide the subject name for accurate faculty information.
The CSD department has experienced faculty including Dr. Sarah Johnson, Dr. Rajesh Kumar, Prof. Priya Sharma, Dr. Amit Patel, and more. Ask about a subject to know who teaches it.
Subjects include Software Engineering, Artificial Intelligence, Full Stack Web Development, Computer Networks, and Managerial Communication. Labs are also included.
Most subjects are 3 or 4 credits. For example, Software Engineering is 3 credits, while FSWD Lab is 1.5 credits.
Please mention your section (A, B, or C) so I can give you your classroom info.

Section A: Room 312
Section B: Room 313
Section C: Room 309
Please mention your section (A, B, or C) to get the detailed timetable.
Please wait while I fetch your academic calendar... You can ask things like 'When is CIE-1?' or 'When does class start?'. I'm here to help.

CIE-1 is from 08-09-2025 to 10-09-2025
CIE-2 is from 06-11-2025 to 08-11-2025 (Tentative)
Tentative result publication is scheduled between 05-01-2026 and 10-01-2026.
The Parents Teachers Meeting-1 is on 20-09-2025.
Practical exams & preparation holidays are from 10-11-2025 to 22-11-2025.
Theory Semester End Examinations are from 24-11-2025 to 06-12-2025.
Please contact the college accounts department for accurate fee details. I can only provide academic-related information.
The minimum attendance required is 75% to be eligible for exams. Please contact your class in-charge for your attendance status.
Lab subjects like SE Lab, AI Lab, and FSWD Lab are usually conducted on Thursdays and Saturdays. Please check your section timetable.
Library session is usually scheduled on Tuesday (Section B) and Wednesday (Section C).
This is the Computer Science & Data Science (CSD) department under Lords Institute of Engineering & Technology.
You are studying at Lords Institute of Engineering & Technology, affiliated with Osmania University, Hyderabad.
